entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kentville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kentville AAFC 03:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: -0.2°C
Wind: S 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain near noon then to drizzle in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 15 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Drizzle changing to snow in the evening and ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early in the evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
